meanings.sent1: After thinking more, she redecided to go to the park.
meanings.sent2: He redecided to wear a blue shirt instead of a red one.
meanings.sent3: The cat redecided to nap in the sun instead of chasing birds.
meanings.sent4: The student redecided his study schedule like a puzzle master rearranging pieces.
meanings.sent5: The clouds constantly redecided their shapes in the sky.

meanings.sent1: She redecided to bake cookies instead of a cake for the party.
meanings.sent2: He redecided to take the bus instead of walking to work.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel redecided to store acorns in a different tree for fun.
meanings.sent4: The river redecided its course after heavy rains, surprising the townspeople.
meanings.sent5: The artist redecided the color scheme of the painting, creating a whole new mood.
